name: WorkOS
title: workos.com
payoff: Enterprise Ready with a few lines of code
shortDescription: WorkOS provides a robust platform for developers to integrate enterprise-level features such as single sign-on and directory sync into their applications quickly and efficiently. It is designed for developers looking to cater to enterprise customers without the lengthy development times typically associated. An example use case would be a SaaS provider looking to offer enhanced security features to attract larger corporate clients.
pros: Supports a wide range of identity providers
cons: May be overkill for smaller applications
Potential complexity in managing multiple integrations
Cost could be prohibitive for startups

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Okta
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Widely used for enterprise identity solutions

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: OneLogin
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Provides similar SSO and MFA features
